patthana1.16:1.1: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhā.
patthana1.16:2.1: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— micchattaniyate khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:3.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana1.16:3.1_1: hetupaccayā—micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
patthana1.16:4.1: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.16:5.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana1.16:5.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.16:5.1_2: aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe… khandhe
patthana1.16:5.1_3: paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe…
patthana1.16:5.1_4: dve mahābhūtā. Mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:6.1: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—micchattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:7.1: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sammattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:8.1: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….

patthana1.16:10.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe aniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana1.16:10.1_2: paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe… vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā. (Sabbe paccayā
patthana1.16:11.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte
patthana1.16:11.1_1: nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi,
patthana1.16:11.1_2: kamme nava, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte
patthana1.16:11.1_3: tīṇi, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate nava. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.16:13.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ aniyataṁ
patthana1.16:13.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe…

patthana1.16:17.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.16:17.1_2: …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… asaññasattānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.16:18.1: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati naanantarapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ, sabbāni paccayāni vitthāretabbāni.)
patthana1.16:19.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare
patthana1.16:19.1_1: pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte nava,
patthana1.16:19.1_2: naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne
patthana1.16:19.1_3: ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate
patthana1.16:21.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe
patthana1.16:21.1_1: naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi,
patthana1.16:21.1_2: navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.16:23.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte ekaṁ …pe… vigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.16:26.1: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana1.16:28.1_1: paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe

patthana1.16:29.1: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā micchattaniyatā khandhā.
patthana1.16:30.1: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā sammattaniyatā khandhā.
patthana1.16:31.1: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā micchattaniyatā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:32.1: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā sammattaniyatā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.

patthana1.16:35.1_1: uppajjanti hetupaccayā—micchattaniyataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā
patthana1.16:35.1_2: …pe… dve khandhe …pe… micchattaniyate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana1.16:36.1: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paccayā sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Tīṇi pañhā, micchattasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.16:37.1: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … (saṅkhittaṁ, kusalattike paccayavārasadisaṁ vibhajitabbaṁ) … avigatapaccayā.
patthana1.16:38.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare
patthana1.16:38.1_1: satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta,
patthana1.16:38.1_2: purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye
patthana1.16:38.1_3: sattarasa, jhāne sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa,
patthana1.16:38.1_4: atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)

patthana1.16:40.1_2: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṁ paccayā khandhā. Ekaṁ
patthana1.16:40.1_3: mahābhūtaṁ …pe… asaññasattānaṁ …pe… cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ
patthana1.16:40.1_4: paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ. Vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā aniyatā khandhā. Vicikicchāsahagate
patthana1.16:40.1_5: uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana1.16:83.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— micchattaniyatā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.16:84.1_1: paccayo—micchattaniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ

patthana1.16:86.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—aniyatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.16:87.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā micchattaniyate
patthana1.16:87.1_1: pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Micchattaniyate khandhe
patthana1.16:87.1_3: jānanti. Micchattaniyatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa,
patthana1.16:88.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā
patthana1.16:88.1_2: cittaṁ jānanti. Sammattaniyatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.16:89.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā
patthana1.16:89.1_1: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā
patthana1.16:89.1_2: jhānaṁ paccavekkhati, ariyā phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ
patthana1.16:89.1_3: gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ariyā aniyate
patthana1.16:89.1_4: pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti. Pubbe samudāciṇṇe
patthana1.16:89.1_5: kilese jānanti. Cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniyate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
patthana1.16:89.1_6: assādenti abhinandanti, taṁ ārabbha aniyato rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.16:89.1_7: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena
patthana1.16:90.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— rūpajīvitindriyaṁ
patthana1.16:90.1_2: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Yaṁ vatthuṁ parāmasantassa micchattaniyatā khandhā uppajjanti,
patthana1.16:90.1_3: taṁ vatthu micchattaniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:91.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—nibbānaṁ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:92.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—micchattaniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:93.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—micchattaniyatādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:94.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.16:95.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—sammattaniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:96.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.16:96.1_1: sahajātādhipati. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.16:97.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.16:98.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.16:98.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ
patthana1.16:98.1_2: katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā …pe… ariyā
patthana1.16:98.1_3: phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ
patthana1.16:98.1_4: gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ
patthana1.16:98.1_5: …pe… aniyate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā aniyato rāgo
patthana1.16:99.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—nibbānaṁ maggassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:100.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— micchattaniyatā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:101.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—maggo phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:102.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā aniyatā
patthana1.16:102.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ aniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:102.1_2: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … phalaṁ phalassa … anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā
patthana1.16:102.1_3: … nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:103.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— aniyataṁ domanassaṁ
patthana1.16:103.1_1: micchattaniyatassa domanassassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Aniyatamicchādiṭṭhi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā
patthana1.16:104.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:105.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisaṁ)
patthana1.16:105.1_2: paccayo (paṭiccavārasadisaṁ, tisso pañhā) … nissayapaccayena paccayo. (Kusalattikasadisā, terasa pañhā.)
patthana1.16:106.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:106.1_4: kātabbaṁ.) Niyatamicchādiṭṭhi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhi
patthana1.16:107.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.16:107.1_2: dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti. Pitaraṁ jīvitā voropetvā …pe…
patthana1.16:107.1_3: arahantaṁ jīvitā voropetvā …pe… duṭṭhena cittena tathāgatassa lohitaṁ uppādetvā …pe…
patthana1.16:107.1_4: saṅghaṁ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.16:108.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo
patthana1.16:108.1_1: maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa
patthana1.16:109.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.16:109.1_2: anuppannaṁ samāpattiṁ uppādenti, uppannaṁ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato
patthana1.16:109.1_3: anattato vipassanti. Maggo ariyānaṁ atthappaṭisambhidāya …pe… ṭhānāṭhānakosallassa
patthana1.16:109.1_4: upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Maggo phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:110.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.16:110.1_2: dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ …pe… jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ abhiññaṁ
patthana1.16:110.1_3: … samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti. Aniyataṁ sīlaṁ … sutaṁ … cāgaṁ
patthana1.16:110.1_4: … paññaṁ … rāgaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … utuṁ … bhojanaṁ
patthana1.16:110.1_5: … senāsanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… nigamaghātaṁ karoti. Aniyatā saddhā …pe… paññā,
patthana1.16:110.1_6: rāgo …pe… senāsanaṁ aniyatāya saddhāya …pe… kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa,
patthana1.16:110.1_7: phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṁ tasseva
patthana1.16:110.1_8: …pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṁ tasseva …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ dutiyassa
patthana1.16:111.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.16:111.1_2: voropeti …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Aniyataṁ dosaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ …pe…
patthana1.16:111.1_3: senāsanaṁ upanissāya mātaraṁ jīvitā voropeti …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Aniyato rāgo
patthana1.16:112.1_0: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.16:112.1_2: parikammaṁ paṭhamassa maggassa …pe… catutthassa maggassa parikammaṁ catutthassa maggassa
patthana1.16:113.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.16:113.1_2: assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha aniyato rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.16:113.1_3: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa
patthana1.16:113.1_5: cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa … vatthu aniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:114.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.16:115.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. **Vatthupurejātaṁ**—vatthu sammattaniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:116.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:117.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā sammattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:118.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:119.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā aniyatā
patthana1.16:119.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ aniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo. Anulomaṁ
patthana1.16:120.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—aniyataṁ domanassaṁ
patthana1.16:120.1_1: micchattaniyatassa domanassassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. Aniyatamicchādiṭṭhi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā
patthana1.16:121.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:122.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— micchattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:123.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.16:123.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—micchattaniyatā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:124.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena
patthana1.16:124.1_1: paccayo—micchattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ
patthana1.16:125.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sammattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:126.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.16:127.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena
patthana1.16:127.1_1: paccayo—sammattaniyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ
patthana1.16:128.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.16:128.1_3: khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:129.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko aniyato eko khandho
patthana1.16:129.1_1: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.16:130.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena
patthana1.16:130.1_1: paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:131.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.16:131.1_2: paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:132.1_0: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.16:132.1_2: paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—sammattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:133.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
patthana1.16:133.1_2: paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhā vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu
patthana1.16:133.1_4: …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa … vatthu aniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena
patthana1.16:133.1_5: paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:134.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. **Purejātaṁ**—vatthu micchattaniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:135.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. **Purejātaṁ**—vatthu sammattaniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:136.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— micchattaniyato
patthana1.16:136.1_1: eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe… dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:137.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.16:137.1_2: **Pacchājātā**—micchattaniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:138.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo—micchattaniyato
patthana1.16:138.1_1: eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo
patthana1.16:139.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…. (Tisso pañhā.)
patthana1.16:140.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
patthana1.16:140.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. **Sahajāto**—aniyato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.16:140.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana1.16:140.1_3: …pe… khandhā vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo. Vatthu khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:140.1_5: vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo
patthana1.16:140.1_6: uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā
patthana1.16:140.1_7: saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa
patthana1.16:140.1_8: …pe… cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa … vatthu aniyatānaṁ
patthana1.16:140.1_9: khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—aniyatā khandhā purejātassa imassa
patthana1.16:140.1_10: kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. **Kabaḷīkāro āhāro**—imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena
patthana1.16:141.1_0: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. **Purejātaṁ**—rūpajīvitindriyaṁ
patthana1.16:141.1_1: mātughātikammassa …pe… ruhiruppādakammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Vatthu micchattaniyatānaṁ
patthana1.16:142.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. **Purejātaṁ**—vatthu sammattaniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:143.1_0: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena
patthana1.16:143.1_1: paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. **Sahajāto**—micchattaniyato eko khandho ca vatthu
patthana1.16:143.1_2: ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe… dve khandhā ca …pe….
patthana1.16:144.1_0: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.16:144.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. **Sahajātā**—micchattaniyatā khandhā ca mahābhūtā
patthana1.16:144.1_3: khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. **Pacchājātā**—micchattaniyatā
patthana1.16:144.1_4: khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:145.1: Sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…. (Dve pañhā micchattaniyatasadisā.)
patthana1.16:146.1_0: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca,
patthana1.16:146.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte
patthana1.16:146.1_2: tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta,
patthana1.16:146.1_3: magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā pañca, vigate
patthana1.16:148.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:149.1_0: Micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.16:149.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:150.1: Micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:151.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:152.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:153.1: Sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:154.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana1.16:154.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana1.16:154.1_2: paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:155.1: Aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:156.1: Aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.16:157.1: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā micchattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.16:158.1: Micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.16:159.1: Sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā sammattaniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.16:160.1: Sammattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.16:161.1_0: Nahetuyā terasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare terasa, nasahajāte
patthana1.16:161.1_1: nava, naaññamaññe nava, nanissaye nava, naupanissaye terasa, napurejāte ekādasa,
patthana1.16:161.1_2: napacchājāte terasa, naāsevane terasa, nakamme navipāke naāhāre terasa …pe… namagge
patthana1.16:161.1_3: terasa, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte satta, noatthiyā satta, nonatthiyā terasa,
patthana1.16:163.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare
patthana1.16:163.1_1: satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta …pe… namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi,
patthana1.16:163.1_2: navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.16:165.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca,
patthana1.16:165.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte
patthana1.16:165.1_2: tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre satta, indriye jhāne magge satta,
patthana1.16:165.1_3: sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca,
